fields.description: The type of the FHIR resource.
fields.name: resourceType
fields.note: resourceType must be FamilyMemberHistory

fields.description: The logical ID of the resource to update.
fields.name: id

fields.description: Indication of whether a patient is adopted.
fields.name: extension(patient-adopted)
fields.note: Only returned when relationship is FAMMEMB and value is true.

binding.description: A code that identifies the status of the family history record.

fields.description: A code specifying the status of the record of the family history of a specific family member.
fields.name: status

binding.description: Codes describing the reason why a family member's history is not available.

fields.description: Describes why the family member's history is not available.
fields.name: dataAbsentReason

fields.description: The person who this history concerns.
fields.name: patient

fields.description: The family member's name.
fields.name: name

binding.description: A relationship between two people characterizing their "familial" relationship

fields.description: The type of relationship this person has to the patient (father, mother, brother etc.).
fields.name: relationship
fields.note: • A relationship of FAMMEMB indicates a FamilyMemberHistory that contains information specific to the patient that pertains to all relations of the patient.

binding.description: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

fields.description: The birth sex of the family member.
fields.name: sex

fields.description: The actual or approximate date of birth of the relative.
fields.name: born[x]

fields.description: Deceased flag or the approximate age of the relative at the time of death for the family member history record.
fields.name: deceased[x]
fields.note:
• When deceased field is not provided, it is defaulted to deceasedBoolean false.
  • When deceasedAge is provided without the precision extension, it is defaulted to 'Age'

binding.description: Code system intended to include all units of measures.

fields.description: Approximate age of the relative at the time of death for the family member history record.
fields.name: deceasedAge.unit

binding.description: Indication of the precision of a given value.

fields.description: Indication of the precision of a given value.
fields.name: deceasedAge.extension(precision)
fields.note: • When precision is not provided, it is defaulted to 'Age'

fields.description: The significant Conditions (or condition) that the family member had.
fields.name: condition
fields.note: Each item in the list must represent a distinct condition.

fields.description: Unique id for inter-element referencing.
fields.name: condition.id
fields.note: If a condition.id is returned on a read, it must be provided on an update.

binding.description: Identification of the condition, problem or diagnosis.

fields.description: The actual condition specified.
fields.name: condition.code

fields.description: The age of onset.
fields.name: condition.onset[x]
fields.note: • When onsetAge is provided without the precision extension, it is defaulted to 'Age'

binding.description: Code system intended to include all units of measures.

fields.description: The age of onset.
fields.name: condition.onsetAge.unit

binding.description: Indication of the precision of a given value.

fields.description: Indication of the precision of a given value.
fields.name: condition.onsetAge.extension(precision)
fields.note: • When precision is not provided, it is defaulted to 'Age'

fields.description: An area where general notes can be placed about this specific condition.
fields.name: condition.note

binding.description: Indication of the presence (positive) or absence (negative) of a given condition.

fields.description: Indication of the presence (positive) or absence (negative) of a given condition. Must be provided. The result may indicate the absence of a condition which may lead to different clinical decisions than if the result were positive.
fields.name: condition.modifierExension(condition-result)

binding.description: Indication of whether a condition is active, inactive, resolved, etc.

fields.description: Indication of whether a condition is active, inactive, resolved, etc. The lifecycle status indicates the relevance of a given condition. If a condition is resolved or inactivated, it may no longer be clinically relevant. The lifecycle status may not be returned if it is not applicable to the given condition.
fields.name: condition.modifierExension(condition-lifecycle-status)

binding.description: The progression of a given condition.

fields.description: Indication of a condition's progress since diagnosis.
fields.name: condition.extension(condition-course)

binding.description: The progression of a given condition.

fields.description: A qualification of the seriousness or impact on health of the family member condition.
fields.name: condition.extension(familymemberhistory-severity)
